title: Callie's Tally: An Accounting of Baby's First Year
description: An irreverent journal of a new mother's expenses during her daughter's first year of life follows her family's descent into chaos in the wake of new schedules and responsibilities and documents baby-related expenses, from nappies and formula to post-partum peppermint patties. Reprint. 15,000 first printing.
author: Betsy Howie
